title: Java Source Attachment Preference Page Layout Issue
description: This bug report concerns a layout problem on the Java Source Attachment Preference Page.
OB: The observed issue is that there is a label positioned in the middle of the page with excessive white space around it, which affects the layout of the Java Source Attachment Preference Page.
EB: The expected behavior is that the label's vertical alignment should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING, and it should be positioned at the top of the page, consistent with the layout of other elements.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1) Load a project from the repository. 2) Select a source folder. 3) Open Properties. 4) Select 'Java Source Attachment'. 5) An information label will appear in the middle of the dialog, exhibiting excessive white space.
